markdownRemark.html:
Pandas are really sweet.

Here's a video of a panda eating sweets.

Once you save the file, look at /my-files/ againï¿½the new markdown file is in the table. This is a very powerful feature of Gatsby. Like the earlier siteMetadata example, source plugins can live-reload data. gatsby-source-filesystem is always scanning for new files to be added and when they are, re-runs your queries.
